SAMPLE.TITLE: Generic sample from Sus scrofa
SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: Tissue sample of heart (HEA) prepared by pooling from five healthy Hampshire gilts at age four to six months. Total-RNA extraction was performed using RNeasy Maxi Kit (Qiagen).

SAMPLE.TITLE: Generic sample from Sus scrofa
SAMPLE.DESCRIPTION: Tissue sample of Longissimus dorsi (LDO) prepared by pooling from five healthy Hampshire gilts at age four to six months. Total-RNA extraction was performed using RNeasy Maxi Kit (Qiagen).
